resources.string: "External consulting for Viessmann. Currently working on ViCare application."

"The work consisted of creating new features and maintaining Noggin application. The app was written in modern android stack in big multi-module monorepository for several of the Paramount products. It consisted of over 200 modules and maintained over 80% unit test coverage."

"External consulting for Huawei. Maintenance and fixes for several Huawei\'s system applications. Prototyping applications based on client requirements. Analyzing performance problems and anomalies of EMUI user interface and system."

"Continued maintenance and bug fixes for SmartThings (Samsung Connect) application as well as taking parts in writing new features and refactoring apps to new standard. Notably I was invited to two business trips to South Korea as support in development."
"Maintenance and bug fixes for SmartThings (Samsung Connect) application."

"I hereby give consent for my personal data included in the application to be processed for the purposes of the current and future recruitment processes in accordance with Art. 6 paragraph 1 letter a of the Regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council (EU) 2016/679 of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation)."
